    • Constructor Detail

      • GameHandler

        public GameHandler(java.util.List<ClientHandler> clients,
                   int dimension,
                   boolean noroof,
                   int winCondition)
        Makes a new Game.
        Parameters:
        clients - - The list of clients that are going to play the game
        dimension - - The dimensions of the game
        noroof - - True if clients want no roof, false if they are the dimension as the roof
        winCondition - - The win condition of the game (default = 4)

    • Method Detail

      • getGame

        public Game getGame()
        Returns the game object.
        Returns:
        Game - Game object

      • wantHint

        public void wantHint(ClientHandler client)
        Sets a boolean to true so the thread knows the current client wants a hint.
        Parameters:
        client - - The client that asks for a hint

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Sends a message to all clients participating in the game.

      • stopGame

        public void stopGame()
        Stops the thread.

      • disconnectGame

        public void disconnectGame(ClientHandler disconnect)
        When a client disconnects or leaves this method is called. It will send every client a message saying that the game ended.
        Parameters:
        disconnect - - Client that disconnected

      • gameOver

        public void gameOver(java.lang.String winner)
        When the game is over this method will tell everyone who the winner is or if it is a draw.
        Parameters:
        winner - - String with the username of the winner or "Draw" if a draw

      • getMove

        public void getMove(int x,
                    int y,
                    ClientHandler client)
        Method used by the server to set nextMove[] to the next move. Will only change it if it is the client's turn.
        Parameters:
        x - - The x value of the move
        y - - The y value of the move
        client - - The client that wants to make a move

      • notifyMove

        public void notifyMove(int x,
                       int y)
        This method will notify all clients of the recent move.
        Parameters:
        x - - The x value of the move
        y - - The y value of the move

      • run

        public void run()
        Controller for the game. Shuffles the playerlist. Tries to make a move when nextMove[0] is not -1 anymore. When a move is made set nextMove[0] back to -1 to indicate that the move has been processed. If the client wants a hint the wantHint boolean becomes true and this thread will give back an x and y value. If the game is over and there is a winner notify everyone about it. If the winner has logged in also make a leaderboard score.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
